name: Dragon Pieces
description:
Entry for NGJ2015, you control a dragon and you have to move like one to control.

Keyboard Version:

Red Dragon (wasd to control, x to dash)

Blue Dragon (arrow keys to control, dot(.) to dash)

Controller Version(Recommended):

Left Stick to control dragon

Circle to dash

Goal:

The goal of the game is to disconnect your enemy's head from his body, which drain his energy and you will win. Your Energy is draining constantly and leaving a trail behind, But it can be recharged in your starting corner by placing your tail there. You can reconnect to your body parts by swinging the disconnected body part close to one of your own disconnected body parts.
